attributes.background: close and cancel the slt & entire school.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
If you want schools to close, you might like to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

The latest guidance on schools returning in January is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021
